messages.subject: Cowboy Bob's Website Overhaul
messages.msgSnippet: To those who might care, Just wanted to let everyone that I ve given my site a complete overhaul which was a long time coming. It can still be reached by the
messages.messageBody:
To those who might care,

Just wanted to let everyone that I've given my site a
complete overhaul which was a long time coming. It can
still be reached by the same URL:

http://asia.geocities.com/gentleman9/index.html

I'm still beta testing it so if some of the pages
don't quite work yet please drop me an email and let
me know. Though I belive everything that has a
hyperlink does work. Mind you it is still very much a
work in progress so anyone who has comments/complaints
please drop me a note. I'd also like to thank Rich T
for previewing the first Beta test and giving his
opinions, Thanks mate.

Bob R
aka "Cowboy Bob"

P.S. To those of you who run/operate websites or
listserves I'd like to know if I might add your sites
to my links page. Drop me an email with your web
address and if there is any particular wording I
should use to promote your site. Thanks

=====
Check out "Cowboy" Bob's Books & Things at:
http://asia.geocities.com/gentleman9/index.html

__________________________________
